Jan Dennison

Web Developer

Why, hello there.

I am a Full-Stack UX/Web Developer experienced in web design and front-to-back development, and passionate about unifying both into creative, performant, accessible User Experiences. Highly-skilled in component-based CSS and modular JavaScript, I also specialize in bridging the languages of design and development. My documentation receives compliments.

Additionally, I am the Chapter Leader of the Girl Develop It Columbus chapter, teach Introduction to JavaScript, have held volunteer positions as graphic designer & web developer for local arts and entertainment groups, and regularly submit artwork to charity gallery shows.

I love to talk about Sass, UX/UI, movies, and puppies of all kinds.
